text: Guillermo Galeote Jiménez (6 May 1941 - 28 January 2021) was a Spanish politician and physician. He was a member of the Spanish Socialist Workers' Party. Galeote was born in San Sebastián, Spain. Galeote was a member of the Congress of Deputies from 1977 to 1993. Galeote died on 28 January 2021 in Madrid from COVID-19, aged 79.Muere Guillermo Galeote, exsecretario de finanzas del PSOE ==References== Category:1941 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Madrid Category:Spanish politicians Category:Spanish physicians
title: Guillermo Galeote
